scripts.start: npm run build && concurrently --kill-others "npm run serve" "npm run sass-watch"
scripts.copy: mkdir -p public && mkdir -p public/uploads && mkdir -p public/admin && cp src/admin/* public/admin && cp src/index.html public && mkdirp -p src/uploads && cp src/uploads/* public/uploads
scripts.build: npm run copy && node build.js && npm run sass && npm run build-js
scripts.preversion: npm run lint && npm run deps && npm test
scripts.deps: dependency-check package.json && dependency-check package.json --unused --entry test/*.js -i dependency-check -i eslint -i eslint-config-invintus -i tap-spec
